channel.title: PkScape (Silab client server)
channel.description:
[ul]Ok, so I was going through my old PC from early April 2009, from when I first got into RSPS.
I found this old source I edited and had fun with, just thought it would be nice to post on here :p
CREDITS (needs to be first) Mod Allstar - 90% for the source Me - 5% for putting shit in, moving stuff around My friend John - 5% for some ideas back in the day :p
Now for the features I've edited: [list] [*]Added a new home, next to skills [*]Added AGS special [*]Added new godsword stances [*]Replaced blood runes. [*]Changed emote tab colors, to prevent confusion :D [/list]
Pictures: [img]http://img243.imageshack.us/img243/9890/85696404.png[/img] [img]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/9950/90100379.png[/img] [img]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/7217/11703966.png[/img] [img]http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/7048/44735805.png[/img] Download: http://www.multiupload.com/LTZELWS5OE
Have fun MoparScape :p
PS: This is for beginners, people looking to start off leeching, hopefully actually try to learn something and other shit. :s[/ul]

item.title: PkScape (Silab client server)
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

private servers were a lot simpler for noobs when silab was the only used client. Great job, reminds me of my old 2008 server. Recommend for starters wanting to play with some fun stuff =p

Read full topic
